**Dataset:** *worlds_fairs* -- Data about fairs/expositions held globally with data
on cost, attendance, location, type, etc. 

**Loading packages & dataset**
```{r}
##Load packages
library(tidyverse)
library(gtsummary)
library(here)

#Load dataset
world_fairs <- read.csv(here("./data/worlds_fairs.csv"))
```

**Creating table with descriptive statistics**
```{r}
head(worlds_fairs)
tbl_summary(
world_fairs,
	by="category",
	include = c(country, visitors, cost),
	label = list(
		country ~ "Country",
		visitors ~ "Visitors",
		cost ~ "Cost"),
	statistic = list(
		visitors ~ c("{p25},{p75}({median})"),
		cost ~ c("{p25},{p75}({median})"))) |>
	bold_labels()

```
